====== Feature type

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:targeted-survey-ecological-community-protocol-shapes:disturbance-type:feature-type`
|Label | Feature type
|Definition | The value of `tern:featureType` _MUST_ be: http://linked.data.gov.au/def/tern-cv/7e256d28-e686-4b6a-b64a-ac1b1a8f164d[`land surface disturbance`].
|Comment | TERN's ecologists have determined the feature type is _land surface disturbance_, defined by the link:https://www.publish.csiro.au/book/5230/[Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook].
